name: websheetjs
description: Render website sections with lazy-loaded data from Google Spreadsheets

scripts.build: cp src/websheet.js dist/websheet.js && npx uglifyjs src/websheet.js --compress --mangle eval -o dist/websheet.min.js && ls -lh dist/websheet.min.js | awk '{print "websheetjs minified! ("$5")"}'

author: Pierre Avinain
